answers.text:
Thanks James!   Be sure to post your thoughts on this topic over on the CMS blog site.  We are interested in gathering as many perspectives as possible on this important topic!

author: Cheryl Hilvert
text:
We have begun a conversation on the topic of employee morale and would love to gather your thoughts on the things we do that impact morale in the workplace.  Would you share your thoughts on this important topic?  
http://icma.org/en/results/management_strategies/resources/blogpost/1505/Employee_morale_Whats_wrong_with_this_picture
title: Are you interested in employee morale?
